mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todos (diaryid, userid, date, workout, start_hour, start_minute, end_hour, end_minute) VALUES (#{diaryId}, #{userId}, #{date}, #{workout}, #{startHour}, #{startMinute}, #{endHour}, #{endMinute})
mapper.select: SELECT todoid, diaryid, userid, date, workout, start_hour as starthour, start_minute as startminute, end_hour as endhour, end_minute as endminute FROM todos WHERE diaryId = #{diaryId}
